00080 #define VAL_NONE        0
00081 #define VAL_LOW         1
00082 #define VAL_MEDIUM      2
00083 #define VAL_HIGH        3
00084 #define VAL_VERYHIGH    4
00085 #define VAL_PLUS        5
00086 #define VAL_VERYPLUS    6
00087 #define VAL_MINUS       7
00088 #define VAL_VERYMINUS   8

00091 /* These are names of the 16 colors */
00092 #define COLOR_WHITE             0
00093 #define COLOR_YELLOW            1
00094 #define COLOR_ORANGE            2
00095 #define COLOR_RED               3
00096 #define COLOR_DARKRED           4
00097 #define COLOR_DARKBLUE          5
00098 #define COLOR_LIGHTBLUE         6
00099 #define COLOR_BROWN             7
00100 #define COLOR_LIGHTGREEN        8
00101 #define COLOR_DARKGREEN         9
00102 #define COLOR_OLIVE             10
00103 #define COLOR_LIGHTBROWN        11
00104 #define COLOR_LIGHTGRAY         12
00105 #define COLOR_MEDIUMGRAY        13
00106 #define COLOR_DARKGRAY          14
00107 #define COLOR_BLACK             15

00132 
00133 /* color pixel values */
00134 #define UNPOWERED       COLOR_LIGHTBLUE
00135 #define POWERED         COLOR_RED
00136 #define CONDUCTIVE      COLOR_LIGHTGRAY

00139 #define DRAW_BEGIN \
00140     int col, row; \
00141     unsigned short tile; \
00142     short *mp; \
00143     unsigned char *imageBase; \
00144     unsigned char *image; \
00145     UQuad *mem; \
00146     UQuad m; \
00147     int lineBytes = view->line_bytes8; \
00148     int pixelBytes = view->pixel_bytes; \
00149     mp = &map[0][0]; \
00150     imageBase = view->x->color ? view->data : view->data8; \
00151     for (col = 0; col < WORLD_W; col++) { \
00152         image = imageBase + (3 * pixelBytes * col); \
00153         for (row = 0; row < WORLD_H; row++) { \
00154             tile = *(mp++) & LOMASK; \
00155             if (tile >= TILE_COUNT) { \
00156                 tile -= TILE_COUNT; \
00157             }
00158 
00159 
00160 #ifdef IS_INTEL
00161 
00162 #define ROW1_8(n) \
00163             m = mem[n]; \
00164             image[0] = (unsigned char)(m); \
00165             image[1] = (unsigned char)(m >>8); \
00166             image[2] = (unsigned char)(m >>16); \
00167             image += lineBytes;
00168 
00169 #define ROW1_16(n) \
00170             memcpy((char *)image, ((char *)mem) + (n * 4 * 2), (3 * 2)); \
00171             image += lineBytes;
00172 
00173 #define ROW1_24(n) \
00174             memcpy((char *)image, ((char *)mem) + (n * 4 * 3), (3 * 3)); \
00175             image += lineBytes;
00176 
00177 #define ROW1_32(n) \
00178             memcpy((char *)image, ((char *)mem) + (n * 4 * 4), (3 * 4)); \
00179             image += lineBytes;
00180 
00181 #else
00182 
00183 #define ROW1_8(n) \
00184             m = (UQuad)(mem[n]); \
00185             image[0] = (unsigned char)(m >>24); \
00186             image[1] = (unsigned char)(m >>16); \
00187             image[2] = (unsigned char)(m >>8); \
00188             image += lineBytes;
00189 
00190 #define ROW1_16(n) \
00191             m = (UQuad)mem[n]; /* XXX: WRONG. handle depth */ \
00192             image[0] = (unsigned char)(m >>24); \
00193             image[1] = (unsigned char)(m >>16); \
00194             image[2] = (unsigned char)(m >>8); \
00195             image += lineBytes;
00196 
00197 #define ROW1_24(n) \
00198             m = (UQuad)mem[n]; /* XXX: WRONG. handle depth */ \
00199             image[0] = (unsigned char)(m >>24); \
00200             image[1] = (unsigned char)(m >>16); \
00201             image[2] = (unsigned char)(m >>8); \
00202             image += lineBytes;
00203 
00204 #define ROW1_32(n) \
00205             m = (UQuad)mem[n]; /* XXX: WRONG. handle depth */ \
00206             image[0] = (unsigned char)(m >>24); \
00207             image[1] = (unsigned char)(m >>16); \
00208             image[2] = (unsigned char)(m >>8); \
00209             image += lineBytes;
00210 
00211 #endif
00212 
00213 #define ROW3_8 ROW1_8(0) ROW1_8(1) ROW1_8(2)
00214 #define ROW3_16 ROW1_16(0) ROW1_16(1) ROW1_16(2)
00215 #define ROW3_24 ROW1_24(0) ROW1_24(1) ROW1_24(2)
00216 #define ROW3_32 ROW1_32(0) ROW1_32(1) ROW1_32(2)
00217 
00218 #define ROW3 \
00219             switch (view->x->depth) { \
00220                 case 1: \
00221                 case 8: \
00222                     ROW3_8 \
00223                     break; \
00224                 case 15: \
00225                 case 16: \
00226                     ROW3_16 \
00227                     break; \
00228                 case 24: \
00229                     ROW3_24 \
00230                     break; \
00231                 case 32: \
00232                     ROW3_32 \
00233                     break; \
00234                 default: \
00235                     assert(0); /* Undefined depth */ \
00236                     break; \
00237             }
00238 
00239 #define DRAW_END \
00240             mem = (UQuad *)&view->smalltiles[tile * 4 * 4 * pixelBytes]; \
00241             ROW3 \
00242         } \
00243     }

00246 void Micropolis::drawAll()
00247 {
00248     DRAW_BEGIN
00249     DRAW_END
00250 }

00252 
00253 void Micropolis::drawRes()
00254 {
00255     DRAW_BEGIN
00256         if (tile >= COMBASE) {
00257             tile = DIRT;
00258         }
00259     DRAW_END
00260 }
00261 
00262 
00263 void Micropolis::drawCom()
00264 {
00265     DRAW_BEGIN
00266         if ((tile > COMLAST) ||
00267             ((tile >= LVRAIL6) &&
00268              (tile < COMBASE))) {
00269             tile = DIRT;
00270         }
00271     DRAW_END
00272 }
00273 
00274 
00275 void Micropolis::drawInd()
00276 
00277 {
00278     DRAW_BEGIN
00279         if (((tile >= RESBASE) && (tile < INDBASE)) ||
00280             ((tile >= PORTBASE) && (tile < SMOKEBASE)) ||
00281             ((tile >= TINYEXP) && (tile <= TINYEXPLAST)) ||
00282             (tile >= FOOTBALLGAME1)) {
00283             tile = DIRT;
00284         }
00285     DRAW_END
00286 }
00287 
00288 
00289 void Micropolis::drawLilTransMap()
00290 {
00291     DRAW_BEGIN
00292         if ((tile >= RESBASE) ||
00293             ((tile >= BRWXXX7) && (tile <= LVPOWER10)) ||
00294             (tile == UNUSED_TRASH6)) {
00295             tile = DIRT;
00296         }
00297     DRAW_END
00298 }

00300 
00301 void Micropolis::drawPowerGrid()
00302 {
00303     short col, row;
00304     unsigned short tile;
00305     short *mp;
00306     unsigned char *image, *imageBase;
00307     UQuad *mem;
00308     UQuad m;
00309     int lineBytes = view->line_bytes8;
00310     int pixelBytes = view->pixel_bytes;
00311 
00312     int pix;
00313     int powered, unpowered, conductive;
00314 
00315     if (view->x->color) {
00316         powered = view->pixels[POWERED];
00317         unpowered = view->pixels[UNPOWERED];
00318         conductive = view->pixels[CONDUCTIVE];
00319     } else {
00320         powered = 255;
00321         unpowered = 0;
00322         conductive = 127;
00323     }
00324 
00325     mp =
00326         &map[0][0];
00327     imageBase =
00328         view->x->color ? view->data : view->data8;
00329 
00330     for (col = 0; col < WORLD_W; col++) {
00331 
00332         image =
00333             imageBase + (3 * pixelBytes * col);
00334 
00335         for (row = 0; row < WORLD_H; row++) {
00336             tile = *(mp++);
00337 
00338             if ((tile & LOMASK) >= TILE_COUNT) {
00339                 tile -= TILE_COUNT;
00340             }
00341 
00342             if ((tile & LOMASK) <= LASTFIRE) {
00343                 tile &= LOMASK;
00344                 pix = -1;
00345             } else if (tile & ZONEBIT) {
00346                 pix = (tile & PWRBIT) ? powered : unpowered;
00347             } else {
00348                 if (tile & CONDBIT) {
00349                     pix = conductive;
00350                 } else {
00351                     tile = DIRT;
00352                     pix = -1;
00353                 }
00354             }
00355 
00356             if (pix < 0) {
00357                 mem = (UQuad *)&view->smalltiles[tile * 4 * 4 * pixelBytes];
00358                 ROW3
00359             } else {
00360                 switch (view->x->depth) {
00361 
00362                     case 1:
00363                     case 8:
00364                         image[0] = image[1] = image[2] = pix;
00365                         image += lineBytes;
00366                         image[0] = image[1] = image[2] = pix;
00367                         image += lineBytes;
00368                         image[0] = image[1] = image[2] = pix;
00369                         image += lineBytes;
00370                         break;
00371 
00372                     case 15:
00373                     case 16: {
00374                         unsigned short *p;
00375                         p = (unsigned short *)image;
00376                         p[0] = p[1] = p[2] = pix;
00377                         image += lineBytes;
00378                         p = (unsigned short *)image;
00379                         p[0] = p[1] = p[2] = pix;
00380                         image += lineBytes;
00381                         p = (unsigned short *)image;
00382                         p[0] = p[1] = p[2] = pix;
00383                         image += lineBytes;
00384                         break;
00385                     }
00386 
00387                     case 24:
00388                     case 32: {
00389                         int x, y;
00390                         for (y = 0; y < 3; y++) {
00391                             unsigned char *img = image;
00392                             for (x = 0; x < 4; x++) {
00393                                 *(img++) = (pix >> 0) & 0xff;
00394                                 *(img++) = (pix >> 8) & 0xff;
00395                                 *(img++) = (pix >> 16) & 0xff;
00396                                 if (pixelBytes == 4) {
00397                                     img++;
00398                                 } // if
00399                             } // for x
00400                             image += lineBytes;
00401                           } // for y
00402                           break;
00403                       }
00404 
00405                     default:
00406                         assert(0); /* Undefined depth */
00407                         break;
00408 
00409                 }
00410             }
00411         }
00412     }
00413 }

00415 
00416 bool Micropolis::dynamicFilter(
00417   int col,
00418   int row)
00419 {
00420     int populationDensity = populationDensityMap.worldGet(col, row);
00421     int rateOfGrowth = rateOfGrowthMap.worldGet(col, row);
00422     int traffic = trafficDensityMap.worldGet(col, row);
00423     int pollution = pollutionDensityMap.worldGet(col, row);
00424     int crime = crimeRateMap.worldGet(col, row);
00425     int landValue = landValueMap.worldGet(col, row);
00426     int police = policeStationEffectMap.worldGet(col, row);
00427     int fire = fireStationEffectMap.worldGet(col, row);
00428 
00429 
00430     return (
00431         ((dynamicData[0] > dynamicData[1]) ||
00432          (populationDensity >= dynamicData[0]) &&
00433          (populationDensity <= dynamicData[1])) &&
00434         ((dynamicData[2] > dynamicData[3]) ||
00435          (rateOfGrowth >= ((2 * dynamicData[2]) - 256)) &&
00436          (rateOfGrowth <= ((2 * dynamicData[3]) - 256))) &&
00437         ((dynamicData[4] > dynamicData[5]) ||
00438          (traffic >= dynamicData[4]) &&
00439          (traffic <= dynamicData[5])) &&
00440         ((dynamicData[6] > dynamicData[7]) ||
00441          (pollution >= dynamicData[6]) &&
00442          (pollution <= dynamicData[7])) &&
00443         ((dynamicData[8] > dynamicData[9]) ||
00444          (crime >= dynamicData[8]) &&
00445          (crime <= dynamicData[9])) &&
00446         ((dynamicData[10] > dynamicData[11]) ||
00447          (landValue >= dynamicData[10]) &&
00448          (landValue <= dynamicData[11])) &&
00449         ((dynamicData[12] > dynamicData[13]) ||
00450          (police >= dynamicData[12]) &&
00451          (police <= dynamicData[13])) &&
00452         ((dynamicData[14] > dynamicData[15]) ||
00453          (fire >= dynamicData[14]) &&
00454          (fire <= dynamicData[15])));
00455 }
00456 
00457 
00458 void Micropolis::drawDynamic()
00459 {
00460     DRAW_BEGIN
00461         if (tile > LASTFIRE) {
00462             if (!dynamicFilter(col, row)) {
00463                 tile = DIRT;
00464             } // if
00465         } // if
00466     DRAW_END
00467 }

00469 
00470 short Micropolis::getCI(short x)
00471 {
00472     if (x < 50) {
00473         return VAL_NONE;
00474     }
00475     if (x < 100) {
00476         return VAL_LOW;
00477     }
00478     if (x < 150) {
00479         return VAL_MEDIUM;
00480     }
00481     if (x < 200) {
00482         return VAL_HIGH;
00483     }
00484     return VAL_VERYHIGH;
00485 }
00486 
00488 void Micropolis::drawPopulationDensity()
00489 {
00490     short x, y;
00491 
00492     drawAll();
00493     for (x = 0; x < WORLD_W; x += populationDensityMap.MAP_BLOCKSIZE) {
00494         for (y = 0; y < WORLD_H; y += populationDensityMap.MAP_BLOCKSIZE) {
00495             maybeDrawRect(
00496                 getCI(populationDensityMap.worldGet(x, y)),
00497                 x * 3,
00498                 y * 3,
00499                 3 * populationDensityMap.MAP_BLOCKSIZE,
00500                 3 * populationDensityMap.MAP_BLOCKSIZE);
00501         }
00502     }
00503 }
00504 
00505 
00506 void Micropolis::drawRateOfGrowth()
00507 {
00508     short x, y;
00509 
00510     drawAll();
00511 
00512     for (x = 0; x < rateOfGrowthMap.MAP_W; x++) {
00513         for (y = 0; y < rateOfGrowthMap.MAP_H; y++) {
00514             short val;
00515             short z = rateOfGrowthMap.get(x, y);
00516             if (z > 100) {
00517                 val = VAL_VERYPLUS;
00518             } else {
00519                 if (z > 20) {
00520                     val = VAL_PLUS;
00521                 } else {
00522                     if (z < -100) {
00523                         val = VAL_VERYMINUS;
00524                     } else {
00525                         if (z < -20) {
00526                             val = VAL_MINUS;
00527                         } else {
00528                             val = VAL_NONE;
00529                         }
00530                     }
00531                 }
00532             }
00533             maybeDrawRect(
00534                 val,
00535                 x * 24,
00536                 y * 24,
00537                 24,
00538                 24);
00539         }
00540     }
00541 }
00542 
00543 
00545 void Micropolis::drawTrafficDensityMap()
00546 {
00547     short x;
00548     short y;
00549 
00550     drawLilTransMap();
00551 
00552     for (x = 0; x < WORLD_W; x += trafficDensityMap.MAP_BLOCKSIZE) {
00553         for (y = 0; y < WORLD_H; y += trafficDensityMap.MAP_BLOCKSIZE) {
00554             maybeDrawRect(
00555                 getCI(trafficDensityMap.worldGet(x, y)),
00556                 x * 3,
00557                 y * 3,
00558                 3 * trafficDensityMap.MAP_BLOCKSIZE,
00559                 3 * trafficDensityMap.MAP_BLOCKSIZE);
00560         }
00561     }
00562 }
00563 
00564 
00566 void Micropolis::drawPollutionMap()
00567 {
00568     short x, y;
00569 
00570     drawAll(view);
00571 
00572     for (x = 0; x < WORLD_W; x += pollutionDensityMap.MAP_BLOCKSIZE) {
00573         for (y = 0; y < WORLD_H; y += pollutionDensityMap.MAP_BLOCKSIZE) {
00574             maybeDrawRect(
00575                 getCI(10 + pollutionDensityMap.worldGet(x, y)),
00576                 x * 3,
00577                 y * 3,
00578                 3 * pollutionDensityMap.MAP_BLOCKSIZE,
00579                 3 * pollutionDensityMap.MAP_BLOCKSIZE);
00580         }
00581     }
00582 }

00660 
00661 void Micropolis::memDrawMap()
00662 {
00663 
00664     switch (view->map_state) {
00665 
00666       case MAP_TYPE_ALL:
00667           drawAll(view);
00668           break;
00669 
00670       case MAP_TYPE_RES:
00671           drawRes(view);
00672           break;
00673 
00674       case MAP_TYPE_COM:
00675           drawCom(view);
00676           break;
00677 
00678       case MAP_TYPE_IND:
00679           drawInd(view);
00680           break;
00681 
00682       case MAP_TYPE_POWER:
00683           drawPowerGrid(view);
00684           break;
00685 
00686       case MAP_TYPE_ROAD:
00687           drawLilTransMap(view);
00688           break;
00689 
00690       case MAP_TYPE_POPULATION_DENSITY:
00691           drawPopulationDensity(view);
00692           break;
00693 
00694       case MAP_TYPE_RATE_OF_GROWTH:
00695           drawRateOfGrowth(view);
00696           break;
00697 
00698       case MAP_TYPE_TRAFFIC:
00699           drawTrafficDensityMap(view);
00700           break;
00701 
00702       case MAP_TYPE_POLLUTION:
00703           drawPollutionDensityMap(view);
00704           break;
00705 
00706       case MAP_TYPE_CRIME:
00707           drawCrimeRateMap(view);
00708           break;
00709 
00710       case MAP_TYPE_LAND_VALUE:
00711           drawLandValueMap(view);
00712           break;
00713 
00714       case MAP_TYPE_FIRE_RADIUS:
00715           drawFireRadius(view);
00716           break;
00717 
00718       case MAP_TYPE_POLICE_RADIUS:
00719           drawPoliceRadius(view);
00720           break;
00721 
00722       case MAP_TYPE_DYNAMIC:
00723           drawDynamic(view);
00724           break;
00725 
00726       default:
00727           assert(0); /* Undefined map */
00728           break;
00729 
00730     }
00731 
00732   /*
00733     if (!view->x->color) {
00734         ditherMap(view);
00735         XSetForeground(view->x->dpy, view->x->gc, view->pixels[COLOR_BLACK]);
00736         XSetBackground(view->x->dpy, view->x->gc, view->pixels[COLOR_WHITE]);
00737         XPutImage(view->x->dpy, view->pixmap, view->x->gc, view->image,
00738                   0, 0, 0, 0, view->m_width, view->m_height);
00739     }

00744 
00745 void Micropolis::ditherMap()
00746 {
00747 /*
00748     int i, x, y, width, height;
00749     int err, pixel1, pixel8;
00750     int line_bytes1 = view->line_bytes;
00751     int line_bytes8 = view->line_bytes8;
00752     unsigned char *image1 = view->data;
00753     unsigned char *image8 = view->data8;
00754     int *errors;
00755 
00756     width = view->m_width;
00757     height = view->m_height;
00758 
00759     errors = (int *)newPtr(sizeof(int) * width);
00760 
00761     for (i = 0; i < width; i++) {
00762         errors[i] = (getRandom16() & 15) - 7;
00763     }
00764 
00765     err = (getRandom16() & 15) - 7;
00766 
00767     for (y = 0; y < height; y += 2) {
00768         unsigned char *i1 = image1;
00769         unsigned char *i8 = image8;
00770 
00771         image1 += line_bytes1;
00772         image8 += line_bytes8;
00773 
00774         for (x = 0; x < width; x += 8) {
00775             pixel1 = 0;
00776             for (i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
00777                 pixel1 <<= 1;
00778                 pixel8 = *(i8++) + err + errors[x + i];
00779                 if (pixel8 > 127) {
00780                     err = pixel8 - 255;
00781                 } else {
00782                     pixel1 |= 1;
00783                     err = pixel8;
00784                 }
00785                 errors[x + i] = err/2;
00786                 err = err/2;
00787             }
00788             *(i1++) = pixel1;
00789         }
00790 
00791         i1 = image1 + (width / 8) - 1;
00792         i8 = image8 + width - 1;
00793 
00794         image1 += line_bytes1;
00795         image8 += line_bytes8;
00796 
00797         for (x = width - 8; x >= 0; x -= 8) {
00798             pixel1 = 0;
00799             for (i = 7; i >= 0; i--) {
00800                 pixel1 >>= 1;
00801                 pixel8 = *(i8--) + err + errors[x + i];
00802                 if (pixel8 > 127) {
00803                     err = pixel8 - 255;
00804                 } else {
00805                     pixel1 |= 128;
00806                     err = pixel8;
00807                 }
00808                 errors[x + i] = err/2;
00809                 err = err/2;
00810             }
00811             *(i1--) = pixel1;
00812         }
00813     }
00814 
00815     freePtr(errors);
00816 */
00817 }

00840 
00841 void Micropolis::drawRect(
00842   int pixel,
00843   int solid,
00844   int x,
00845   int y,
00846   int w,
00847   int h)
00848 {
00849 /*
00850     int W = view->m_width, H = view->m_height;
00851 
00852     if (x < 0) {
00853         if ((w += x) < 0) {
00854             w = 0;
00855         }
00856         x = 0;
00857     } else if (x > W) {
00858         x = 0;
00859         w = 0;
00860     }
00861     if (x + w > W) {
00862         w = W - x;
00863     }
00864     if (y < 0) {
00865         if ((h += y) < 0) {
00866             h = 0;
00867         }
00868         y = 0;
00869     } else if (y > H) {
00870         y = 0;
00871         h = 0;
00872     }
00873     if (y + h > H) {
00874         h = H - y;
00875     }
00876 
00877     if (w && h) {
00878         int i, j, stipple = (x ^ y) & 1;
00879         unsigned char *data =
00880             view->x->color ? view->data : view->data8;
00881 
00882         // In the case of black and white, we use an 8 bit buffer and dither it.
00883         int pixelBytes =
00884             view->x->color ? view->pixel_bytes : 1;
00885         Quad line =
00886             view->x->color ? view->line_bytes : view->line_bytes8;
00887 
00888         unsigned char *image =
00889             &(data[(line * y) + (x * pixelBytes)]);
00890 
00891         switch (pixelBytes) {
00892 
00893             case 1: {
00894                 unsigned char *data =
00895                     view->data8;
00896                 unsigned char *image =
00897                     &data[(line * y) + (x * pixelBytes)];
00898 
00899                 if (solid) {
00900                     for (i = h; i > 0; i--) {
00901                         for (j = w; j > 0; j--) {
00902                             *image = pixel;
00903                             image++;
00904                         }
00905                         image += line - w;
00906                     }
00907                 } else {
00908                     for (i = h; i > 0; i--) {
00909                         for (j = w; j > 0; j--) {
00910                             if (stipple++ & 1) {
00911                                 *image = pixel;
00912                             }
00913                             image++;
00914                         }
00915                         if (!(w & 1))
00916                             stipple++;
00917                         image += line - w;
00918                     }
00919                 }
00920                 break;
00921             }
00922 
00923             case 2: {
00924                 unsigned short *data =
00925                     (unsigned short *)view->data;
00926                 unsigned short *image;
00927                 line >>= 1; // Convert from byte offset to short offset
00928                 image =
00929                     &data[(line * y) + x];
00930 
00931                 if (solid) {
00932                     for (i = h; i > 0; i--) {
00933                         for (j = w; j > 0; j--) {
00934                             *image = pixel;
00935                             image++;
00936                         }
00937                         image += line - w;
00938                     }
00939                 } else {
00940                     for (i = h; i > 0; i--) {
00941                         for (j = w; j > 0; j--) {
00942                             if (stipple++ & 1) {
00943                                 *image = pixel;
00944                             }
00945                             image++;
00946                         }
00947                         if (!(w & 1)) {
00948                             stipple++;
00949                         }
00950                         image += line - w;
00951                     }
00952                 }
00953                 break;
00954             }
00955 
00956             case 3:
00957             case 4: {
00958                 unsigned char *data =
00959                     (unsigned char *)view->data;
00960                 unsigned char *image;
00961                 int bitmapPad = view->x->small_tile_image->bitmap_pad;
00962                 int rowBytes = view->x->small_tile_image->bytes_per_line;
00963                 line = rowBytes >> 1; // Convert from byte offset to short offset
00964                 image = &data[(line * y) + x];
00965 
00966                 if (solid) {
00967                     for (i = h; i > 0; i--) {
00968                         for (j = w; j > 0; j--) {
00969                             *(image++) = (pixel >> 0) & 0xff;
00970                             *(image++) = (pixel >> 8) & 0xff;
00971                             *(image++) = (pixel >> 16) & 0xff;
00972                             if (bitmapPad == 32) {
00973                                 image++;
00974                             }
00975                         }
00976                         image += line - w;
00977                     }
00978                 } else {
00979                     for (i = h; i > 0; i--) {
00980                         for (j = w; j > 0; j--) {
00981                             if (stipple++ & 1) {
00982                               *(image++) = (pixel >> 0) & 0xff;
00983                               *(image++) = (pixel >> 8) & 0xff;
00984                               *(image++) = (pixel >> 16) & 0xff;
00985                               if (bitmapPad == 32) {
00986                                   image++;
00987                               }
00988                           }
00989                         }
00990                         if (!(w & 1)) {
00991                             stipple++;
00992                         }
00993                         image += line - w;
00994                     }
00995                 }
00996                 break;
00997             }
00998 
00999             default:
01000                 assert(0); // Undefined depth
01001                 break;
01002 
01003         }
01004 
01005     }
01006 */
01007 }
